availability.p: License accepted by the editor Andrea de Leeuw van Weenen in a mail dated 28 February 2024 to the head of the Menota archive, Alex Speed Kjeldsen.

sourceDesc.bibl: Photographic facsimiles of the whole manuscript from the Arnamagnæan Collection in Copenhagen.

origin.p: The manuscript has been written in Iceland in c. 1200-1225.

projectDesc.p: This manuscript text has been encoded according to the standard set out in The Menota handbook (version 3.0 beta) as of 6 December 2017.

normalization.p: This manuscript text has been encoded on three levels: facsimile, diplomatic and normalised.

correction.p: The text was proofread several times by Andrea de Leeuw van Weenen and a final time before printing by Tom Lorenz in September 2016.

interpretation.p: This text has been fully lemmatised and morphologically analysed according to the rules specified in ch. 11 of the Menota Handbook, v. 3.0 beta. Words missing in the manuscript text and added in supplied tags by the editor are neither lemmatized nor morphologically analyzed.

revisionDesc.change:
2024-02-29
Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : Updated the “availability” element in the header so that the file is now free (CC-BY-SA 4.0)

2020-02-26
Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : Words in the “supplied” element had been given lemma and me:msa attributes with the values “xxx”, i.e. “w lemma="###" me:msa="###"”; these attributes have now been deleted so that words in the “supplied” element only have a “w” element with no attributes; these words will be equally searchable in the XML file, but will not cause confusion for the Corpuscle application in morphological queries

2020-02-25
Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : Changed all “eE” to “eP” (enclitic pronoun) according to the v. 3.0 guidelines of Menota

2020-02-24
Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : (1) Changed all “yDA” name tokens (for government of accusative or dative) with “yAD”; (2) Changed all “cDA” name tokens with “cAD” (for case accusative or dative)

2020-02-20
Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : Corrected three typos in the me:msa attribute: from “cb” to “cB”, from “nvR” to “vR” and from “gu nFN” to “gFN nS”
2019-12-04 Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen: Moved the file to the public part of Menota and gave it version number 1.0 with the date 4 December 2019; otherwise no changes to the file.

2018-08-27 Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen: After having received a revised file from Andrea de Leeuw van Weenen on 26 July 2018, I have changed the "zero" entity to the "smallzero" entity which will display the character as a small zero in the Tabular style of Andron Scriptor Web (actually using U+F1BD in the Private Use Area of Andron Mega Corpus); there are a total of 138 instances of this character in the file.

2018-01-25 Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen: As a stop-gap measure, added rend="red" to all "seg type="head"", until a more correct encoding can be made; also moved down the "handShift" element into the nearest "p"
2017-12-06 Andrea de Leeuw van Weenen University of Bergen: Revised the encoding of the whole file
2017-11-14 Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen: Made a number of corrections of mistakes pointed out by the editor in mails of 3, 6, 7 and 8 November
2017-10-28 Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen: Added red colour to the last line on f. 1r, and did a test with having a new sections begin on a new line on ff. 2r and 2v
2017-10-03 Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen: Revised the encoding of f. 1r–2v, adding missing "lb/" elements and specified initial types, introducing a "subtype" attribute
2017-09-17 Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen: Changed the interpretation of the "THORNbar" entity from "0024" (question mark) to a sequence of the "THORN" and "bar" entities
2017-09-12 Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen: Added the ed="ms" attribute in the "pb", "cb" and "lb" elements
2017-09-11 Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen: Made various updates to the header.
2017-07-31 Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen: By request from the editor, changed the lemma at 5r1512 from "orðigr" to "ǫrðigr" and the normalised form accordingly.

2017-06-13 Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen: Revised the XML elements and attributes according to the latest schema in Menota, corrected imbalanced or missing elements, added a top level of four major div’s, and supplied several elements in the header
2017-04-21 Andrea de Leeuw van Weenen: Converted Menotic XML file from database
